rows.label: tev014301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev014301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Conner about Soul Voices.

rows.label: tev014301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev014301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Conner about recent developments.

rows.label: tev014301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Conner for some combat tips.

rows.label: tev014301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Conner about the tyrants of Primordia.

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0001
rows.name:
I was attacked by a tyrant while patrolling around
the city's exterior walls![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0002
rows.name:
It destroyed my Skell, knocked Monica unconscious,
and critically wounded me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then, when we were at the brink of being wiped out,
our team leader shouted, "Target its weak spot!"
in a booming voice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0004
rows.name:
With a burst of adrenaline, I leapt at the tyrant!
I felt an unbelievable amount of power welling up
inside me, and I knocked it down in one swing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0005
rows.name:
I almost can't believe it really happened.
It was like my leader's voice got me through the crisis
and filled me with renewed vigor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hey, thanks for finding my comm device!
Because of you, I was able to make it back to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0009
rows.name:
My sister and my team leader escorted me back,
but not before my dear sister greeted me with a slap
right across the face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Then I spent the walk home being lectured by the
team leader. In retrospect, being stranded was a lot
more pleasant than being rescued turned out to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's not really my style to look before I leap,
but I'm gonna try to be more careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0012
rows.name: I just don't want to make them worry about me again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0015
rows.name:
First it was that Ganglion squid woman, then it was
the tainted from Noctilum. It's just one monster after
another around this joint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0016
rows.name:
But as dangerous as they appear, they all seem to
either use overly specialized attacks or have some
sort of surprisingly severe weakness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0017
rows.name:
In the former situation, you can just use equipment with
attributes that protect against their specialized attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0018
rows.name:
And in the latter situation, you can strike at their weak
spots, or take advantage of their other vulnerabilities,
to defeat them with surprising ease.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Of course, this is all just armchair strategizing.
If I ever faced a foe like that in real life,
I'd probably crap my pants and run like hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's true that the Beasts' Lair area just north of New LA
is quite dangerous by local standards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Apparently all the indigens there are led by a single
grex.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0027
rows.name:
If we could take it down, it would significantly decrease
the danger level outside the city's walls as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0028
rows.name:
But the darn thing has already fought off numerous
Interceptors already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014301_MSG0029
rows.name:
So if you ever encounter that grex yourself, don't get
any crazy ideas. Just turn around and run for it![ST:wait ]
